resources.string: Note: You can watch 20 ads per day and after that you\'ll have 24 hour cool down.
You can join our facebook and telegram group for more information or any kind of help you need. You can contact us by using these links. We\'ll be more than happy to help you!
Both link provides direct link to our official group. If you have any kind of learning problem, like how to use this application, then you can watch video from this following link:
Hmm. No Internet connection. Please connect to the internet and try again!

string.name: faq_initial
string.b: Before you begin, please note that every section of "Rewards" will give you an extra scope to earn more points. So it is highly recommended to use them more often!

string.name: faq_first_question
string.b: What is the use of Points?

resources.string: Answer : Points are must for being in the top position of the "Leaderboard". If you are able to reach one of the top positions, you\'ll be able to redeem points into real money. But you must have at least 10000 points to be eligible for one of the "Leaderboard" positions (Minimum requirement)

Answer : If you answer quiz, you\'ll get only 10 points for each answer. But if you go to "Rewards" section and watch ads (only 20), you\'ll get 50 points for each. That means a total of 1000 Points which is quite a big deal.
If you don\'t want to use it you\'re welcome. But if other users use that efficiently, they might get to the top position way faster than you.
But note that you\'ll get only 20 chances. After that there will be a 8 hours cool down. But in the mean time you can still answer quiz to earn points.
Answer : Top Three (5) users (will increase if participants increases) from each 10 days of a month will get the cash prize (Note: They must have at least 10000 coins to withdraw).
Answer: You\'ll find all the answered question number and earned points in "Profile". You\'ll also get your Login information like username, email and profile photo.

Answer: If you become one of the top Three (5) (will increase if participants increases) users, you will be able to withdraw money by exchanging your coins which will be given only when you are able to reach one of the top positions.
If you are from Bangladesh, you\'ll be able to withdraw money using \"Bkash\" & \"Rocket\".
But if you\'re from other countries, you can withdraw using \"Paypal\". If you still get any problem, you can join our facebook group and ask for help. You\'ll be notified in not more than one hour.

Answer: You can share Geeks Job. You\'ll not get anything directly. But if you\'re a winner, then you should share more. Because the more the users, the more the prize, the more you\'ll earn. So don\'t be a selfish. Because sharing is caring.

Answer: You can answer as many as Quiz you want. You\'ll get 10 points for completing each quiz. You can answer quiz from the Movies and sports or Science and History, any section you like. But note that Religion and Curriculum is still under development. Until then, you can use other sections.
If you answer a wrong question, you\'ll get a penalty for about 10 seconds. But no points will be deducted from your account. It\'s an won and won situation.
You won\'t be able to pass or skip any question.
Please note that: If you leave application for any reason, you\'ll have to start again.

Answer: The \"Reward\" in the quiz section is for additional points for the user. If you\'re answering quiz, you should also use \"Reward\". Because Reward in the Quiz section gives 30 points.
Note that: Reward in Quiz section comes in every 3 minutes after watching!.
Ad couldn\'t be loaded right now. Please try again sometimes later.
This section is only used for sending messages to the user of Geeks Job from \"Defender Studio\". When you win, you\'ll get your messages in this block. Thanks for using Geeks Job.
Notice: There must be at least 50 (Fifty) users in the tournament. Unless no points will be added in the Leaderboard!
